headline: Emerson to Present at Barclays 43rd Annual Industrial Select Conference
summary: Emerson (NYSE: EMR) today announced President and Chief Executive Officer, Lal Karsanbhai, and Chief Financial Officer, Mike Baughman, will present at the Barclays 43rd Annual Industrial Select Conference on Tuesday, February 17th in Miami Beach, Florida. The presentation will begin at 10:25 a.m. Eastern Time, 9:25 a.m. Central Time.

headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Emerson Electric’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Emerson’s fourth quarter results received a positive market response, as the company met Wall Street’s revenue expectations and posted a modest beat on non-GAAP earnings per share. Management attributed the quarter’s solid performance to broad-based demand for automation solutions, particularly in North America, India, and the Middle East, with power generation, LNG, and test and measurement segments standing out.
